post:
Hello,

ErrantWeb is here to provide a few sales to the LowEndTalk community! We would like to offer OpenVZ hosting and KVM hosting in Metro-Detroit on sale to you, also we are going to be offering Chicago KVM on sale to you! 


**_OPENVZ METRO-DETROIT SALE_**

**Guaranteed-Ram:** 1024MB
**vSwap:** 512MB
**RAID Storage:** 15GB
**Bandwidth:** 75GB
**vCPU Cores:** 2
**Location:** Metro-Detroit

**Pricing:**
$6.50/m or $16.50/quarter($5.50/m)
**Url To Order:**
https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=57



**_KVM CHICAGO SALE_**

**Ram:** 512MB
**Raid Storage:** 20GB
**Bandwidth:** 2000GB ( Get it raised to 3000GB for free just open a ticket! )
**CPU Cores (Xeon E3-1230 3.2GHz):** 2 
**OS:** Free linux distro's or you can provide your own ISO & Key for Linux or Windows!
**IPv6:** 10 ( for more open ticket )
**IPv4:** 1

**Pricing:**
$5.50/m or $15.00/quarter($5.00/m)
**Url To Order:**
https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=86


**_KVM METRO DETROIT SALE_**

**Ram:** 512MB
**SSD Storage:** 3GB
**Bandwidth:** 75GB
**CPU Cores:** 2
**OS:** Free linux distro's or you can provide your own ISO & Key for Linux or Windows!
**IPv4:** 1 ( Get a additional for free just open a support ticket. )

**Pricing:**
$5.50/m or $15.00/quarter($5.00/m)
**Url To Order:**
https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=72

If you have any questions do not hesitate to open a support ticket on our website or reply here, we will be glad to help.

Regards,
Travis@ErrantWeb.com
